Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/72nd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 71st, Vincennes, 73rd, and Lafayette due to, police activity at Lafayette/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 71st, Vincennes, 73rd, and Lafayette due to, police activity at Lafayette/72nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems on a train near Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems on a train near Ashland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
